name: Post to infusionsoft
author: Farhan haider

sections.description:
This plugin provide you to submit user information to infusionsoft.
if you want any customization regarding form fields, form style, file upload field, google captcha etc. contact at farhanhaider73@gmail.com
Shortcode [PTI_FORM_DATA] .

Plugin advantage

  • Easy to configuration.
  • Unblockable.
  • Plugin supports Chrome, Firefox, Safari and IE
  • Shortcode

Plugin configuration
sections.installation:
1. Go to wp-admin -> Plugins > Add New -> and search for ‘post to infusionsoft’.
    1. Click to install.
    2. Once installed, activate.

OR

Manual Installation:

1. Upload the entire `post-to-infusionsoft` folder to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory.
2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress.
3. Go to `wp-admin -> PTI
sections.changelog:
For more information , any query and your suggestion for plugin functionality improvement you can write us at farhanhaider73@gmail.com .
